


        *---*
input  -|MX |- output 0
        |   |- output 1
addr 0 -|   |- output 2
addr 1 -|   |- output 3
        *---*

INPT|OUTPUT
000 0000
100 1000
010 0000
110 0100
001 0000
101 0010
011 0000
111 0001


tasks: []

call: addtasks
	  call next

	  	  *---*
input 0 - [DMX] - output
input 1 - [   ]
input 2 - [   ]
input 3 - [   ]
addr 0  - [   ]
addr 1  - [   ]
		  *---*

INPT
000000 0	000010 0	000001 0	000011 0
100000 1	100010 0	100001 0	100011 0
010000 0	010010 1	010001 0	010011 0
110000 1	110010 1	110001 0	110011 0
001000 0	001010 0	001001 1	001011 0
101000 1	101010 0	101001 1	101011 0
011000 0	011010 1	011001 1	011011 0
111000 1	111010 1	111001 1	111011 0
000100 0	000110 0	000101 0	000111 1
100100 1	100110 0	100101 0	100111 1
010100 0	010110 1	010101 0	010111 1
110100 1	110110 1	110101 0	110111 1
001100 0	001110 0	001101 1	001111 1
101100 1	101110 0	101101 1	101111 1
011100 0	011110 1	011101 1	011111 1
111100 1	111110 1	111101 1	111111 1

3:2 adder

A - [3:2] - result
B - [ + ] - carry
C - [   ]

INPT
000 00
100 10
010 10
110 01
001 10
101 01
011 10
111 11
